mapper.select: SELECT pt.purchaseTsCode ,pt.mainBusinessCode ,mb.businessName as mbBusinessName ,pt.clientCode ,c.businessName as cBusinessName ,pt.contractCode ,pt.briefs ,pt.dealDate ,pt.regId ,pt.regDate ,pt.updateDate FROM k1_tb_purchase_transaction AS pt INNER JOIN k1_tb_main_business as mb on pt.mainBusinessCode = mb.mainBusinessCode INNER JOIN k1_tb_client as c on pt.mainBusinessCode = c.mainBusinessCode GROUP BY purchaseTsCode;

SELECT pt.purchaseTsCode as purchaseTsCode, pt.mainBusinessCode as mainBusinessCode, pt.clientCode as clientCode, pt.clientBusinessName, pt.contractCode as contractCode, pt.briefs as briefs, pt.dealDate as dealDate, pt.regId as regId, pt.regDate as regDate, pt.updateDate as updateDate FROM k1_view_purchase_transaction AS pt;

SELECT pt.purchaseTsCode, pt.mainBusinessCode, m.businessName, pt.clientCode, pt.clientBusinessName, pt.contractCode, pt.briefs, pt.dealDate, pt.regId, pt.regName, pt.regDate, pt.updateDate FROM k1_view_purchase_transaction AS pt join k1_tb_main_business AS m on pt.mainBusinessCode = m.mainBusinessCode
LIMIT #{startNum}, #{rowPerPage};
